post.text:
Donald Trump agreed to release his tax returns if he ran for office.

Now? "It's none of your business." What's he hiding?

comment.author: Christina
comment.text: Hillary Clinton's running mate Sen. Tim Kaine (D-VA) said in 2002 that politicians facing true allegations of sexual harassment should resign, suggesting Bill Clinton's affair with White House intern Monica Lewinsky is "not appropriate conduct" and "beneath the dignity of the office." Remember folks, professional Politicians = Professional LIARS. And Hillary is one of the best Professional LIARS this country has to offer.

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Trump loves his poorly educated supporters - his words .

replies.author: Christina
replies.text: That's what I love the most about Hillary supporters. They never tell you that your wrong. Because they can't ðŸ˜‚
